Description: Come rent with us! NO FEE!! FEATURING: - airy, eat-in kitchen - large, sunny living room - hardwood floors - FREE off-street parking - direct access to large deck - lots of green space: huge backyard LOCATION: - 15 min walk to Harvard or MIT - Within two blocks to bus lines no. 83, 91, 64, 68, and 69. - 8 min walk to Central Sq. Red line T-station and buses #85 and #1 - 5 min walk to Inman square - All this action, but still located on a very QUIET STREET!
